title: Interpretation of seeing a ship in a dream

preview.html: The interpretation of seeing a ship in a dream generally indicates safety and salvation from distress because our Lord Almighty saved our master Noah, peace be upon him, in the ark, just as their salvation from the infidels was due to their faith. The interpretations of this vision are many and have many connotations, and in this article we will mention some of the interpretations related to seeing the ark. In a dream. Read also: Toilet in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a ship in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a ship in a dream. Seeing a ship in a dream is repeated in many dreams and has many clues and many interpretations, including: Seeing a ship in a dream means that the coming period will be full of riches and riches. The ship in The dream portends a great and wide relief from distress and death from diseases, God willing. A ship in a dream indicates the coming of a period without poverty or anxiety, and if the dreamer is a student studying, then this indicates his excellence in his studies, God willing. This vision also indicates the dreamer’s journey and the achievement of his goals and what He wants it and wants it. Read also: Pregnancy in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a ship in a dream for a single woman. A boat in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates many good things, the arrival of livelihood, blessings, and the nearness of marriage, as follows: Seeing a ship in a dream, for a single woman, shows the strength of her self-confidence and faith. By God Almighty. When an unmarried girl sees herself boarding a ship, this indicates that she is on a good path, and has a lot of sustenance and willpower to achieve what she wants and desires. Seeing the captain of an unmarried ship in a dream indicates that her marriage is approaching, God willing. But if the girl sees For an unmarried woman, she is on the ship and the beach or the water itself appears to her, so this indicates that she is traveling, and God knows best. Read also: Penguin in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a ship in a dream for a married woman. The ship in a dream for a married woman indicates security and tranquility in her home, and it has many connotations, which are as follows. :Seeing a ship in a dream for a married woman is good news for her. This vision also shows the stability of the situation in general in her home. This dream is an indication that the dreamer will soon achieve what he wants and wants from the goals he seeks. A ship in a married woman’s dream indicates a change In her life in general for the better and a life in which joy, goodness and happiness abound, God willing. Read also: Washing the dead. Interpretation of seeing a ship in a dream for a pregnant woman. A ship in a dream for a pregnant woman indicates the goodness, success and safety of the newborn, as follows: When a pregnant woman sees a ship in a dream, this means The end of fatigue and safety and the arrival of security, God willing. If a pregnant woman sees a ship in a dream and asks for money in reality, the dream is good news for her that she will achieve what she desires and get money and many good things. Also, seeing a ship in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates the approaching date. Her birth and that her baby is healthy, and God knows best. title: Interpretation of seeing police in a dream according to the interpretation of Ibn Sirin and Ibn Shaheen

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing police in a dream according to the interpretation of Ibn Sirin and Ibn Shaheen, according to what was stated in the dream interpretation book written by the interpreter scholar Ibn Sirin and the scholar Ibn Shaheen. The fortuneteller is trying to protect them or himself from these dangers or to search for someone who can protect him, so in this article today we will learn together about the interpretation of seeing the police in a dream according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation. And Ibn Shaheen.Interpretation of the dream of seeing the police in a dream. Interpretation of Ibn Sirin. The great jurist Ibn Sirin interprets seeing the police in a dream as one of the dreams that carries many meanings and is often a sign of the complete safety and protection that the dreamer enjoys in life. This vision also foretells to him that he is going well. On a smooth road without risks, God willing. If the fortuneteller is able to talk to the policeman in a dream and then free him, this is a sign of overcoming difficulties, passing exams with great success, and ending the obstacles that blocked the path to insight. And if the police enter the dreamer’s house in a dream, this is a sign that he will live He is safe in his home, and he and his family will receive great care. In some cases, seeing the police in a dream is a sign of recovering many things that the dreamer has lost, whether material or moral. As for disagreement with the police or disagreement with them, it is a reflection of the state of fear and tension that the viewer is experiencing. If the dreamer finds himself in a dream trying to escape from the police, then his dream is considered a sign of his extreme fear of the future and his desire to plan for the future despite his inability to do so. Interpretation of the dream of seeing the police in a dream Interpretation by Ibn Shaheen Ibn Shaheen believes that seeing the police in a dream is Praiseworthy visions are an indication of the great good that the dreamer will achieve in reality. Good news that the dangers to which he was exposed will end and that he will enjoy security and stability in life. The policeman, in Ibn Shaheen’s interpretation, represents the man who will help the dreamer achieve all the desires and dreams he wants in life. The policeman chases the dreamer in the dream as if he were the culprit who had committed a lot of trouble in his life, and accordingly To repent and return to God Almighty to forgive him all his sins. Sins. Commit.If the dreamer sees that he is surrounded by a large number of police officers working to protect him, his vision is an indication that he will reach a great position and status in the near future, at the work level. . . Interpretation of a dream about seeing the police in a dream for a single woman. If a single girl finds out that I have joined the police, this is a sign that she will get a big promotion at work, God willing, and perhaps seeing her is a sign of her ability to achieve and achieve goals. Which she has always dreamed of. But if an unmarried girl sees me talking to a policeman, then my vision is good news for her that she will marry a man of great status, and she will be happy with him and aware of security and stability near him. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a policeman for a married woman: If a married woman sees that the police are raiding her house in... In a dream, this is one of the praiseworthy visions that indicates that she and her family will enjoy protection and security, God willing.

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a wolf in a dream

preview.html: Dream interpretation of seeing a wolf in detail in a dream. The wolf is a predatory animal that lives by eating meat and is found in large areas such as mountains, reserves, or desert areas. The common type among wolves is the gray wolf, the Asian wolf, the Abyssinian wolf, and other forms, which contain about forty species. It is known that wolves are not sedentary in one place, but rather they are animals that love movement and travel. Through their screams. They leave scent clues such as urine or feces on the road for easy tracking of each other. Wolves make very loud noises. When exposed to danger, does seeing a wolf in a dream portend good or bad? Is it desirable or undesirable? We will find the answers to these questions through our article, and what it means to see a pregnant, married, and single wolf in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a wolf by Ibn SirinSeeing a wolf in general in a dream means betrayal, injustice, enemies, and thieves. If you see a wolf entering the dreamer’s house in a dream, this means that a thief will enter His home. As for whoever dreams of a wolf turning into something else, this indicates his repentance. It is not from his descendants but from the bosom of the thief and that he will cause his house to be destroyed and stolen. In general, scholars and dream interpreters unanimously agreed that even if someone sees a wolf in a dream, this indicates an innocent accusation regarding the story of our master Joseph, peace be upon him, when his brothers claimed that The wolves have eaten him. Seeing the dreamer turning into a wolf in a dream shows the dreamer’s strength, courage, and courage. Seeing many wolves in a dream is evidence that there are a large number of people in the dreamer’s life who seem to be his friends, but in reality they are enemies. Seeing a distant wolf in a dream in The dream is evidence that the dreamer is exposed to the hypocrisy of those around him in reality. Interpretation of the dream of seeing a wolf by Ibn Shaheen. Ibn Shaheen interpreted seeing a wolf in a dream as evidence of the ruler’s injustice, treachery, and lies. Seeing wolf meat and eating it in a dream is evidence of the victory of forbidden and illegitimate wealth. Seeing killing a wolf in a dream is a sign To commit sins, disobedience, and stay away from religion. Seeing wolf’s milk in a dream indicates an individual’s fear and anxiety. Interpretation of a dream about a wolf for a single woman. If an unmarried woman sees a wolf, this indicates the presence of a deceitful man who surrounds her with his sweet words and does not intend to marry her. Hearing the howling of a wolf is evidence that there is A plot that is drawn up for the dreamer. Show the girl’s feeling of loneliness and isolation. Interpretation of a dream about a wolf for a married woman. If a married woman sees a wolf in her dream, this indicates a cunning man trying to deceive her in the name of love, so that it is an opportunity to steal her money. Seeing a wolf arising in a married woman’s dream is evidence that The dreamer adopts a child of shameless origin. Interpretation of a dream about a wolf for a pregnant womanIf a pregnant woman sees a wolf in her dream, this means that she will give birth to a clean, smart, and intelligent child. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a wolf in the house in a pregnant woman’s dream is evidence that this woman’s home has been confiscated and a thief has entered her home. Interpretation of a dream about a white wolf: Whoever sees a white wolf in a dream, this indicates that a friend

title: Interpretation of seeing a deceased person wanting a blanket in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing the dead asking for cover in a dream through seeing roy2a.com and seeing the dead cover in a dream indicates the adversity and anguish in which the dreamer lives and many problems and may indicate the need for charity, and we will explain that in detail. Interpretation of seeing the dead asking for cover in a dream from when presented Interpretations of imams such as Ibn Sirin and other scholars of interpretation of visions and dreams in interpreting the dead asking for a cover in a dream in ancient and modern times. Times in a dream for a young man, a single girl, a man, a married woman, a widow, and a pregnant woman, so follow us to the vision site. What is the interpretation of seeing a dead person asking for a blanket in a dream by Ibn Sirin? Seeing the dead asking for a blanket in a dream means troubles and misfortunes to which the fortuneteller will be exposed, and God’s help must be sought in order to remove it. God is sadness. Seeing the deceased asking about the living in a dream indicates the deceased’s need for prayer and a lot of charity, and he may have debts that he did not pay before his death. Seeing the deceased taking a blanket or clothes from the living in a dream means that the dreamer has gone through many problems and failures in some aspects. His life as a legacy of his work. Seeing dead people asking for money indicates the psychological pressures the viewer is exposed to and many family problems. See also: Interpretation of seeing money in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing a dead person asking for a blanket in a dream for a single woman? If an unmarried woman sees that a dead person is asking for a blanket in a dream. In a dream, this indicates her discomfort at work or study and many problems around her. If a girl sees that a dead person asked her to wear clothes and did not give them to him, this indicates a serious misfortune that he will leave her, and God will compensate her with goodness. What is the interpretation of seeing a dead person asking for a blanket in a dream? For a married woman? Seeing a married woman asking for a blanket in a dream indicates marital instability and many problems. Seeing a deceased giving clothes or an offering in a dream to a married woman indicates the death of a close person. See also: Interpretation of seeing receiving money in a dream What is the interpretation of seeing a dead person asking A blanket in a dream for a pregnant woman? Seeing a deceased person in a dream for a pregnant woman indicates difficulty in childbirth. If a pregnant woman sees that her deceased person has died, she will be asked for a cover to protect him from the cold, and giving him an indication that she will be exposed to trouble, pain, and a troubled birth. What is the interpretation of seeing a dead person asking for a blanket in a dream? For a divorced woman? Seeing a dead divorced woman asking for a blanket in a dream means that she will be exposed to adversity and pain, feelings of loneliness and isolation, and psychological problems. Seeing a dead father cold and shivering indicates the problems and difficulties that a woman faces in her professional and social life. See also: Interpretation of a dream about losing money. Interpretation of a dream Dead in a dream? Seeing a dead person in a cold dream indicates bad news and sadness. Seeing a dead person shivering from the cold in a dream means that the dead person needs alms and prayers. What is the interpretation of a dream about giving a dead person a blanket? Seeing a dead person asking for a blanket and giving him a blanket indicates disasters and misfortunes. If someone sees that he is giving the deceased something, he will wear it

If a pregnant woman sees that her deceased person has died, she will be asked for a cover to protect him from the cold, and giving him an indication that she will be exposed to trouble, pain, and a troubled birth. What is the interpretation of seeing a dead person asking for a blanket in a dream? For a divorced woman? Seeing a dead divorced woman asking for a blanket in a dream means that she will be exposed to adversity and pain, feelings of loneliness and isolation, and psychological problems. Seeing a dead father cold and shivering indicates the problems and difficulties that a woman faces in her professional and social life. See also: Interpretation of a dream about losing money. Interpretation of a dream Dead in a dream? Seeing a dead person in a cold dream indicates bad news and sadness. Seeing a dead person shivering from the cold in a dream means that the dead person needs alms and prayers. What is the interpretation of a dream about giving a dead person a blanket? Seeing a dead person asking for a blanket and giving him a blanket indicates disasters and misfortunes. If someone sees that he is giving the deceased something, he will wear it

title: Interpretation of seeing a tiger in a dream according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a tiger in a dream according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation: The tiger is a predatory animal that humans fear approaching because their animal instinct drives them to attack it even if they do not intentionally harm it. An article in which we will learn together about the interpretation of seeing a tiger in a dream according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a tiger in a dream Interpretation of Ibn Sirin If a man sees in his dream that he is in a zoo and in front of him is a tiger cage in front of him, this dream indicates something that he hates, and God knows best. If you see a tiger running quickly, this vision indicates a good acquisition of great wealth. Ibn Sirin mentioned that one of the symbols of seeing a tiger in a dream is that it indicates success, courage and strength. Seeing the purchase of a tiger in a dream means that the dreamer has many friends who hold important positions in reality. If a man sees in a dream that he is running away from a tiger, this vision indicates the disappearance of worries and sorrows. If a man sees in his dream a tiger that makes him feel afraid, this vision indicates a problem that disrupts an important event that awaits the dreamer, such as marriage. Marrying a tiger in a dream indicates the presence of an evil woman in the life of the values ​​​​who seeks to harm him. Whoever dreams that he is drinking tiger milk, this vision indicates a great enmity between him and someone in reality. If a man sees in his dream that a tiger has succeeded in reaching him, this vision symbolizes failure to achieve one of the goals In reality. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a tiger in a dream for a single woman Seeing a tiger in one's dream indicates the dreamer's marriage and relationship with a deceived person. If an unmarried woman sees in her dream that she is playing with a tiger, this vision also indicates marriage and may indicate that she knows a special person in reality. Whoever dreams of a tiger attacking him, this vision indicates that the dreamer is admired by many people. Seeing a tiger's skin in an unmarried woman's dream symbolizes her dowry in reality, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a tiger in a dream for a married woman Seeing a tame tiger in a married woman's dream indicates the happiness she will enjoy and the stability of her married life. If a married woman dreams that she is playing with a tiger, this vision indicates that she will soon become pregnant, and God knows best. One of the symbols of a tiger in a married woman's dream is that it indicates money or a strong relationship with her husband. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a tiger in a dream for a pregnant woman A tiger in a pregnant woman's dream symbolizes the birth of a male child, and God knows best. Hearing the sound of a tiger in a pregnant woman's dream indicates that something bad will happen to her, and God knows best. If a pregnant woman sees in her dream that a tiger is in her house, this vision shows love and care Which you receive in reality. Predatory animals indicate danger in a dream, especially if they attack the dreamer and expose him to danger. In this case, the dream can have a negative impact on the soul and life of the viewer, and it is better to warn against such dreams as they are just dreams.

title: Interpretation of a dream about bleeding according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about bleeding by Ibn Sirin: Seeing some bleeding in a dream means that the dreamer will get money. If one sees his nose bleeding, this indicates the benefit he obtains in his workplace. Seeing blood bleeding in the form of a single drop, this indicates goodness, nourishment, and benefit. Who is dreaming? That he is weak and emaciated after the bleeding, he will be poor. If one sees that he has become strong after the bleeding, he will obtain money and become rich. Seeing blood bleeding in the street is evidence that the dreamer will pay zakat in exchange for the money. Interpretation of a dream about bleeding according to Al-Nabulsi. Al-Nabulsi interpreted the dream about Al-Nawaif as forbidden money. Bleeding In a dream, it portends family problems. Seeing the mouth or head bleeding in a dream indicates sins and transgressions that the dreamer must avoid. Interpretation of a dream about bleeding for a single woman: Seeing a girl bleeding from her vagina is a good sign for her. Bleeding in an unmarried girl’s dream is evidence that she will soon be blessed with a good husband. Bleeding for a girl’s dream can indicate happiness and commitment. Interpretation of a dream about bleeding for a married woman. Bleeding from a married woman’s vulva is a sign of kindness and getting rid of distress. Bleeding in a married woman’s dream indicates following an extensive diet. If she sees bleeding in large quantities, this indicates that she She lies to her husband. Interpretation of a dream about bleeding for a pregnant woman. Bleeding in a dream about pregnancy is considered evidence of an easy and trouble-free birth. Bleeding from a pregnant woman’s vagina in a dream indicates severe pain during childbirth. Bleeding in a pregnant woman’s vagina during a dream is evidence of the presence of a male child. If she sees A pregnant woman is menstruating in a dream, as this indicates an incomplete pregnancy. Interpretation of a dream about bleeding for a man: Seeing bleeding in large quantities in a man’s dream is evidence of the additional fears he is experiencing. Seeing a small amount of bleeding is evidence of a lot of money that the fortuneteller gets. Bleeding feces in a dream A man is evidence of getting rid of worries and problems. Heavy bleeding can also indicate the loss of money, especially if it is with urine. Add the dream you would like to interpret in a comment below the article and we will respond to it and clarify it.

title: What is the complete interpretation of seeing a Shawish in a dream?

preview.html: Trend provides you with an interpretation of Shawish’s dream. It is known that the sergeant is a guardian. In addition, many people dream of Shweesh in their dreams. Below, all the details relate to the interpretation of seeing a Shawish in a dream, complete for families, married and pregnant women, as well as for men. From the books of the great scholars in the interpretation of dreams and visions, if you are only interested in knowing the interpretation of seeing a sergeant, then you should stay with the rest of the article. Interpretation of a dream about a sergeant Ibn SirinThe interpretation of Ibn Sirin in his book about seeing a sergeant in a dream fully testifies to strength, pride, dignity and great work. The interpretation of the dreamer’s vision of becoming a sergeant indicates an improvement in his health and a sign of longevity. Also, seeing a sergeant in a dream is one of the visions that shows the dreamer’s victory over all enemies. Also, seeing a sergeant in a dream indicates that the dreamer has sufficient skills to bear responsibility. Why does a sergeant dream of a bowler? The interpretation of seeing a white suit swinging in a full dream is a sign of the dreamer’s imminent wedding date with a beautiful woman. But seeing a yellow gauze suit in a dream is a sign of illness, fatigue, and great sadness for the dreamer. Why does a sergeant dream of a bowling woman? The interpretation of a lonely woman Seeing a sergeant in a dream fully testifies to her close marriage to a powerful man who holds a prominent position. Seeing an unmarried sergeant in military uniform carrying a burden indicates her adherence to customs and traditions. Seeing a sergeant in an unmarried woman’s dream means that she will achieve her desires and goals and strive for success. Why does a sergeant dream? With a married woman? Seeing a Shawish in a dream filled with a married woman testifies to the degree of her husband’s love for her and his devotion to her and the end of disputes and problems between them. Why does a Shawish dream in a dream of a married woman speak of changes for the better in her life? Seeing a Shawish in a dream also testifies to the success and reconciliation of her children, as well as About the fact that her husband has received a promotion. Why does a sergeant dream of a pregnant woman? The interpretation of a sergeant’s suit for a pregnant woman in a dream speaks about the ease of her birth and the rapid improvement of her health after giving birth. Seeing a child shaving clothes in a dream is complete evidence that God will bless her with a male child. Why does a sergeant dream of a man? Why does a sergeant dream in a man’s dream – one of the desired visions that indicate happy changes that will occur in the fortuneteller’s life. Seeing a sergeant’s clothes for men in a dream speaks of improving living conditions, self-reformation, and defeating enemies. Seeing a sergeant’s gun in a dream is a sign that the dreamer cannot Dealing with many of the problems he suffers from. If you have a dream and want it interpreted, leave it in the comments below and our team will answer you.

title: Interpretation of a dream about oranges and apricots

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing apricot oranges in a dream: Seeing the color orange in a dream is a happy vision that indicates positive energy, joy, pleasure, getting rid of negativity and anxiety, happy marriage for a girl and a young man, success and success in professional life or in study. In this article, we will explain seeing the color orange in a dream for men and women in detail on the summit website. What does it mean to wear orange in a dream? It indicates that you are spending debts, a prestigious job and you get a lot of money. What does it mean to wear orange in a dream for a divorced woman? It expresses joy and pleasure again in her marriage. Orange color in a dream for a man indicates Positive changes and pleasant skin. The orange color of the dead in a dream may indicate the deceased’s high status in heaven and good news for the seer or fortune teller. Seeing the color orange in a single woman’s dream. Seeing a single girl wearing orange in her dream means vitality, activity, departure, and self-realization. The vision also indicates stability, happiness, and a relationship. An emotional affair that ends in marriage. The color orange in a dream for a divorced woman. The color orange in a dream for a divorced woman and a widow indicates joy and happiness and changes her life for the better. The vision again suggests her marriage and rest after fatigue. What does it mean to wear orange in a dream for a married woman? Seeing the same married woman in a dream while she is Wearing orange clothes indicates her good condition and life. The vision also shows an improvement in her financial situation. The orange color of the dead in a dream. Seeing the orange color in a dead person’s dream indicates that he is among the righteous, and has a good ending, God willing. Seeing the orange color of the dead in a dream of the living also indicates The death of anxiety and anxiety and the release of negative energies. It also indicates changing the dreamer’s life from worse to better, and achieving what he desired in the past and for the bright future. What does it mean to wear orange in a dream? If a married woman sees herself in a dream wearing orange clothes, this It means that her life will change for the better and her husband’s love for her. Her psychological state will also improve and all her problems will end. Seeing the color orange in the dream of a divorced woman, widow, or pregnant woman means optimism, hope, and overcoming difficult stages. Seeing the color orange in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates an easy birth. Seeing the color orange in The dream of a divorced or widowed woman indicates her new marriage, wealth and riches. I dreamed that I was wearing a long orange dress for single people. If a single woman sees that she is wearing orange clothes, this means that all her wishes and dreams will come true. Seeing a girl wearing an orange dress suggests positivity, activity and vitality. Also, this vision indicates To the approach of her engagement. Dyeing hair orange in a dream. Seeing hair dyed orange indicates recovery from illness. It also indicates getting rid of difficult situations. If a married woman sees that her hair is orange and she is going through a psychological crisis, this indicates that she has gone through this

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about a tiger for a married woman, Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a tiger for a married woman: The tiger is a wild animal that causes panic and terror when seen in a dream. People feel afraid and are looking for an explanation for this vision and what benefit or message God wants to convey. Through this article, they explained many visions related to seeing a tiger in a dream, whether it is considered a praiseworthy vision or not, and the most important other interpretations such as: Interpretation of a dream about a tiger chasing me for it. For a married woman, interpretation of a dream about a tiger at home for a married woman. Interpretation of a dream about a big tiger for a married woman and interpretation of a dream about escaping from a tiger for a married woman. Interpretation of a dream about a tiger for a married woman. The vision of interpreting a dream about a tiger for a married woman carries many interpretations and important elements that we will present as follows: We find that many interpretation scholars They have analyzed seeing a tiger in a dream as evidence of determination, strength, and obtaining a lot of money and halal food for her husband. If a married woman dreams of a tiger in her house, calm and playing, this symbolizes stability and happiness with her husband. If a married girl sees that she does not have children, then she sleeps next to the tiger. In her bed, this symbolizes her closeness to pregnancy, God willing, and her being blessed with good offspring. A married woman who sees a dead tiger in her dream indicates her husband’s weakness, weakness, and incompetence in marital or practical matters. It is possible that seeing a tiger playing with the dreamer without fear symbolizes that A woman is cheating on her husband in reality. One of the dream interpretation scholars believes that the dreamer seeing that he is feeding a hungry tiger is a sign that he is committing sins and immorality without fearing anyone, but God is watching everything. Interpretation of a dream about a tiger for a married woman Ibn Sirin In his interpretation, seeing a tiger in a dream A married woman is a sign of the collapse of all disagreements and problems from the dreamer’s life, especially in the case where he sees her feeding him, raising him, and taking care of everything in him. It belongs to him. The dreamer sees in a dream that there is a wild tiger that wants to attack the dreamer and kill him, so it is considered one of the warning visions that indicate the injustice of influential people. Ibn Sirin sees in the dream the interpretation of seeing a tiger in a dream as strength, determination, courage, and authority. The interpretation of a dream about a tiger for a married woman, according to Ibn Shaheen. He mentioned Ibn Shaheen’s interpretation of the dream of seeing a black panther in a dream is that it is a sign of the presence of an unjust family member who imposes his control by force. Seeing a dreamer playing with a calm tiger indicates the beginning of a new life full of happiness and joy. Interpretation of a dream about a tiger for a married pregnant woman. A pregnant woman who sees a tiger in her dream is... It is an indication that God will bless her with a healthy male child who will be fair to his family when he grows old and has a strong personality. Dreaming about a pregnant tiger, playing with it and controlling it indicates that she is a strong and courageous person and that her life is stable with her husband. In the event that the dreamer controls the tiger in the dream without causing any harm Harm, the vision symbolizes determination, strength and strictness in her character. Seeing a pregnant tiger in her house is a sign of affection, intimacy and love with her husband. If the dreamer is sick
